sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { posts = [ { id: 1, title: 'Post 1' }, { id: 2, title: 'Post 2' }, { id: 3, title: 'Post 3' }, ]; }
